other

Class ProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • other.ProgressBar

  • public class ProgressBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the progress bars in each conference and the main game, which are used to track the player's progress towards qualifying for nationals.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProgressBar

        public ProgressBar(java.lang.String name,
                   double x,
                   double y,
                   double width,
                   double height,
                   double progress,
                   int total)
        Creates a new ProgressBar object with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        name - the text that is displayed above the progress bar
        x - the x-coordinate of the progress bar
        y - the y-coordinate of the progress bar
        width - the width of the progress bar
        height - the height of the progress bar
        progress - the initial progress of the player relating to the purpose of this progress bar
        total - the maximum progress for this progress bar

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws this progress bar on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        marker - the PApplet onto which this progress bar will be drawn

      • getProgress

        public double getProgress()
        Returns:
        the progress of this progress bar out of the maximum

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(double progress)
        Sets the progress of this progress bar
        Parameters:
        progress - the new progress value

      • decreaseProgress

        public void decreaseProgress(double amount)
        Decreases the progress for this progress bar
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to decrease by

      • increaseProgress

        public void increaseProgress(double amount)
        Increases the progress for this progress bar
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to increase by
